variables.input:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| fieldsAdd OrderStatus = if(revenue > 0, "Success", else: "Failed")
| filter in(OrderStatus, array($OrderStatus))
| fields orderId
| dedup orderId

2.title: 💰 Orders
2.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and 
         event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| fields status = if(revenue > 0, "Success", else: "Failed"), 
         timestamp,     
         userId,
         country, 
         orderId, 
         shippingTrackingId,
         revenue, 
         trace_id,
         span_id,
         analyze = concat("[Trace](", $DynatraceTenantURL, "/ui/apps/dynatrace.distributedtracing/explorer?cv=a%2Cfalse&sidebar=a%2Cfalse&filter=dt.entity.service.entity.name+%3D+frontend+AND+endpoint.name+%3D+%22%2Fapi%2Fcheckout%22+AND+trace.id+%3D+",
                         trace_id,"&traceId=",trace_id,"&tf=",$dt_timeframe_from,";",$dt_timeframe_to,")")
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 999

5.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| summarize  count = countIf(revenue == 0)

7.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and 
         event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| summarize Revenue = sum(revenue)

11.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and 
         event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| summarize  `Zero Dollar Orders` = countIf(revenue == 0)

12.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| summarize  count = count()

14.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| summarize  count = countIf(revenue != 0)

16.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" 
| filter event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success" or 
         event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success" or
         event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success"
| sort timestamp asc
| fieldsAdd placeOrderTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success", timestamp), 
            fraudCheckTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.fraudcheck.success", timestamp),
            orderShippedTimestamp = if(event.type == "astroshop.ordershipped.success", timestamp)
| summarize {orders = count(),
            placeOrderTime = takeMin(placeOrderTimestamp), 
            fraudCheckTime = takeMin(fraudCheckTimestamp),
            orderShippedTime = takeMin(orderShippedTimestamp)
            }, 
            by:{orderId, timestamp = bin(timestamp,5m)}
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| fieldsAdd end_to_end = orderShippedTime - placeOrderTime
| summarize Duration = avg(end_to_end)
| fieldsAdd zero = 0 
| fields Duration = coalesce(Duration,zero)

17.title: 💰 Order Status
17.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and 
         event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| sort timestamp desc
| fields timestamp,status = if(revenue > 0, "Success", else: "Failed") 
| makeTimeseries count = count(),
                 by:{status}
| sort count asc

18.title: ❌  Failed Orders by Country
18.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "astroshop" and 
         event.type == "astroshop.placeorder.success"
| filter in(orderId,array($OrderID))
| fieldsAdd status = if(revenue > 0, "Success", else: "Failed")
| sort timestamp desc
| makeTimeseries count = countIf(status == "Failed"),
                 by:{country}
| sort count desc

21.title: 🚦  IT - Fronted Service
21.query:
fetch spans
| filter request.is_root_span == true AND isNotNull(endpoint.name)
| filter in(dt.entity.service,  classicEntitySelector("type(service), entityname.equals(\"frontend\")"))
	 and matchesValue(`endpoint.name`, "/api/checkout")
| fieldsAdd status = if(request.is_failed, "Failed", else: "Success")
| makeTimeseries count = count(), by:{status}
